00067 void free_disp_elem(DispList *dl)
00068 {
00069     if (dl) {
00070         if (dl->verts) MEM_freeN(dl->verts);
00071         if (dl->nors) MEM_freeN(dl->nors);
00072         if (dl->index) MEM_freeN(dl->index);
00073         if (dl->col1) MEM_freeN(dl->col1);
00074         if (dl->col2) MEM_freeN(dl->col2);
00075         if (dl->bevelSplitFlag) MEM_freeN(dl->bevelSplitFlag);
00076         MEM_freeN(dl);
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00080 void freedisplist(ListBase *lb)
00081 {
00082     DispList *dl;
00083 
00084     dl= lb->first;
00085     while (dl) {
00086         BLI_remlink(lb, dl);
00087         free_disp_elem(dl);
00088         dl= lb->first;
00089     }
00090 }

00092 DispList *find_displist_create(ListBase *lb, int type)
00093 {
00094     DispList *dl;
00095     
00096     dl= lb->first;
00097     while (dl) {
00098         if (dl->type==type) return dl;
00099         dl= dl->next;
00100     }
00101 
00102     dl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "find_disp");
00103     dl->type= type;
00104     BLI_addtail(lb, dl);
00105 
00106     return dl;
00107 }
00108 
00109 DispList *find_displist(ListBase *lb, int type)
00110 {
00111     DispList *dl;
00112     
00113     dl= lb->first;
00114     while (dl) {
00115         if (dl->type==type) return dl;
00116         dl= dl->next;
00117     }
00118 
00119     return NULL;
00120 }

00122 int displist_has_faces(ListBase *lb)
00123 {
00124     DispList *dl;
00125     for (dl= lb->first; dl; dl= dl->next) {
00126         if (ELEM3(dl->type, DL_INDEX3, DL_INDEX4, DL_SURF)) {
00127             return 1;
00128         }
00129     }
00130     return 0;
00131 }
00132 
00133 void copy_displist(ListBase *lbn, ListBase *lb)
00134 {
00135     DispList *dln, *dl;
00136     
00137     freedisplist(lbn);
00138     
00139     dl= lb->first;
00140     while (dl) {
00141         
00142         dln= MEM_dupallocN(dl);
00143         BLI_addtail(lbn, dln);
00144         dln->verts= MEM_dupallocN(dl->verts);
00145         dln->nors= MEM_dupallocN(dl->nors);
00146         dln->index= MEM_dupallocN(dl->index);
00147         dln->col1= MEM_dupallocN(dl->col1);
00148         dln->col2= MEM_dupallocN(dl->col2);
00149 
00150         if (dl->bevelSplitFlag)
00151             dln->bevelSplitFlag= MEM_dupallocN(dl->bevelSplitFlag);
00152 
00153         dl= dl->next;
00154     }
00155 }
00156 
00157 void addnormalsDispList(ListBase *lb)
00158 {
00159     DispList *dl = NULL;
00160     float *vdata, *ndata, nor[3];
00161     float *v1, *v2, *v3, *v4;
00162     float *n1, *n2, *n3, *n4;
00163     int a, b, p1, p2, p3, p4;
00164 
00165 
00166     dl= lb->first;
00167     
00168     while (dl) {
00169         if (dl->type==DL_INDEX3) {
00170             if (dl->nors==NULL) {
00171                 dl->nors= MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3, "dlnors");
00172                 if (dl->verts[2] < 0.0f) dl->nors[2]= -1.0f;
00173                 else dl->nors[2]= 1.0f;
00174             }
00175         }
00176         else if (dl->type==DL_SURF) {
00177             if (dl->nors==NULL) {
00178                 dl->nors= MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3*dl->nr*dl->parts, "dlnors");
00179                 
00180                 vdata= dl->verts;
00181                 ndata= dl->nors;
00182                 
00183                 for (a=0; a<dl->parts; a++) {
00184                     
00185                     if (surfindex_displist(dl, a, &b, &p1, &p2, &p3, &p4)==0)
00186                         break;
00187     
00188                     v1= vdata+ 3*p1; 
00189                     n1= ndata+ 3*p1;
00190                     v2= vdata+ 3*p2; 
00191                     n2= ndata+ 3*p2;
00192                     v3= vdata+ 3*p3; 
00193                     n3= ndata+ 3*p3;
00194                     v4= vdata+ 3*p4; 
00195                     n4= ndata+ 3*p4;
00196                     
00197                     for (; b<dl->nr; b++) {
00198     
00199                         normal_quad_v3( nor,v1, v3, v4, v2);
00200     
00201                         add_v3_v3(n1, nor);
00202                         add_v3_v3(n2, nor);
00203                         add_v3_v3(n3, nor);
00204                         add_v3_v3(n4, nor);
00205     
00206                         v2= v1; v1+= 3;
00207                         v4= v3; v3+= 3;
00208                         n2= n1; n1+= 3;
00209                         n4= n3; n3+= 3;
00210                     }
00211                 }
00212                 a= dl->parts*dl->nr;
00213                 v1= ndata;
00214                 while (a--) {
00215                     normalize_v3(v1);
00216                     v1+= 3;
00217                 }
00218             }
00219         }
00220         dl= dl->next;
00221     }
00222 }
00223 
00224 void count_displist(ListBase *lb, int *totvert, int *totface)
00225 {
00226     DispList *dl;
00227     
00228     dl= lb->first;
00229     while (dl) {
00230         
00231         switch(dl->type) {
00232             case DL_SURF:
00233                 *totvert+= dl->nr*dl->parts;
00234                 *totface+= (dl->nr-1)*(dl->parts-1);
00235                 break;
00236             case DL_INDEX3:
00237             case DL_INDEX4:
00238                 *totvert+= dl->nr;
00239                 *totface+= dl->parts;
00240                 break;
00241             case DL_POLY:
00242             case DL_SEGM:
00243                 *totvert+= dl->nr*dl->parts;
00244         }
00245         
00246         dl= dl->next;
00247     }
00248 }
00249 
00250 int surfindex_displist(DispList *dl, int a, int *b, int *p1, int *p2, int *p3, int *p4)
00251 {
00252     if ((dl->flag & DL_CYCL_V)==0 && a==(dl->parts)-1) {
00253         return 0;
00254     }
00255     
00256     if (dl->flag & DL_CYCL_U) {
00257         (*p1)= dl->nr*a;
00258         (*p2)= (*p1)+ dl->nr-1;
00259         (*p3)= (*p1)+ dl->nr;
00260         (*p4)= (*p2)+ dl->nr;
00261         (*b)= 0;
00262     }
00263     else {
00264         (*p2)= dl->nr*a;
00265         (*p1)= (*p2)+1;
00266         (*p4)= (*p2)+ dl->nr;
00267         (*p3)= (*p1)+ dl->nr;
00268         (*b)= 1;
00269     }
00270     
00271     if ( (dl->flag & DL_CYCL_V) && a==dl->parts-1) {
00272         (*p3)-= dl->nr*dl->parts;
00273         (*p4)-= dl->nr*dl->parts;
00274     }
00275     
00276     return 1;
00277 }

00279 /* ****************** make displists ********************* */
00280 
00281 static void curve_to_displist(Curve *cu, ListBase *nubase, ListBase *dispbase, int forRender)
00282 {
00283     Nurb *nu;
00284     DispList *dl;
00285     BezTriple *bezt, *prevbezt;
00286     BPoint *bp;
00287     float *data;
00288     int a, len, resolu;
00289     
00290     nu= nubase->first;
00291     while (nu) {
00292         if (nu->hide==0) {
00293             
00294             if (forRender && cu->resolu_ren!=0)
00295                 resolu= cu->resolu_ren;
00296             else
00297                 resolu= nu->resolu;
00298             
00299             if (!check_valid_nurb_u(nu));
00300             else if (nu->type == CU_BEZIER) {
00301                 
00302                 /* count */
00303                 len= 0;
00304                 a= nu->pntsu-1;
00305                 if (nu->flagu & CU_NURB_CYCLIC) a++;
00306 
00307                 prevbezt= nu->bezt;
00308                 bezt= prevbezt+1;
00309                 while (a--) {
00310                     if (a==0 && (nu->flagu & CU_NURB_CYCLIC)) bezt= nu->bezt;
00311                     
00312                     if (prevbezt->h2==HD_VECT && bezt->h1==HD_VECT) len++;
00313                     else len+= resolu;
00314                     
00315                     if (a==0 && (nu->flagu & CU_NURB_CYCLIC)==0) len++;
00316                     
00317                     prevbezt= bezt;
00318                     bezt++;
00319                 }
00320                 
00321                 dl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "makeDispListbez");
00322                 /* len+1 because of 'forward_diff_bezier' function */
00323                 dl->verts= MEM_callocN( (len+1)*3*sizeof(float), "dlverts");
00324                 BLI_addtail(dispbase, dl);
00325                 dl->parts= 1;
00326                 dl->nr= len;
00327                 dl->col= nu->mat_nr;
00328                 dl->charidx= nu->charidx;
00329 
00330                 data= dl->verts;
00331 
00332                 if (nu->flagu & CU_NURB_CYCLIC) {
00333                     dl->type= DL_POLY;
00334                     a= nu->pntsu;
00335                 }
00336                 else {
00337                     dl->type= DL_SEGM;
00338                     a= nu->pntsu-1;
00339                 }
00340                 
00341                 prevbezt= nu->bezt;
00342                 bezt= prevbezt+1;
00343                 
00344                 while (a--) {
00345                     if (a==0 && dl->type== DL_POLY) bezt= nu->bezt;
00346                     
00347                     if (prevbezt->h2==HD_VECT && bezt->h1==HD_VECT) {
00348                         copy_v3_v3(data, prevbezt->vec[1]);
00349                         data+= 3;
00350                     }
00351                     else {
00352                         int j;
00353                         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00354                             forward_diff_bezier(    prevbezt->vec[1][j],
00355                                                     prevbezt->vec[2][j],
00356                                                     bezt->vec[0][j],
00357                                                     bezt->vec[1][j],
00358                                                     data+j, resolu, 3*sizeof(float));
00359                         }
00360                         
00361                         data+= 3*resolu;
00362                     }
00363                     
00364                     if (a==0 && dl->type==DL_SEGM) {
00365                         copy_v3_v3(data, bezt->vec[1]);
00366                     }
00367                     
00368                     prevbezt= bezt;
00369                     bezt++;
00370                 }
00371             }
00372             else if (nu->type == CU_NURBS) {
00373                 len= (resolu*SEGMENTSU(nu));
00374                 
00375                 dl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "makeDispListsurf");
00376                 dl->verts= MEM_callocN(len*3*sizeof(float), "dlverts");
00377                 BLI_addtail(dispbase, dl);
00378                 dl->parts= 1;
00379                 
00380                 dl->nr= len;
00381                 dl->col= nu->mat_nr;
00382                 dl->charidx = nu->charidx;
00383 
00384                 data= dl->verts;
00385                 if (nu->flagu & CU_NURB_CYCLIC) dl->type= DL_POLY;
00386                 else dl->type= DL_SEGM;
00387                 makeNurbcurve(nu, data, NULL, NULL, NULL, resolu, 3*sizeof(float));
00388             }
00389             else if (nu->type == CU_POLY) {
00390                 len= nu->pntsu;
00391                 dl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "makeDispListpoly");
00392                 dl->verts= MEM_callocN(len*3*sizeof(float), "dlverts");
00393                 BLI_addtail(dispbase, dl);
00394                 dl->parts= 1;
00395                 dl->nr= len;
00396                 dl->col= nu->mat_nr;
00397                 dl->charidx = nu->charidx;
00398 
00399                 data= dl->verts;
00400                 if (nu->flagu & CU_NURB_CYCLIC) dl->type= DL_POLY;
00401                 else dl->type= DL_SEGM;
00402                 
00403                 a= len;
00404                 bp= nu->bp;
00405                 while (a--) {
00406                     copy_v3_v3(data, bp->vec);
00407                     bp++;
00408                     data+= 3;
00409                 }
00410             }
00411         }
00412         nu= nu->next;
00413     }
00414 }

00416 
00417 void filldisplist(ListBase *dispbase, ListBase *to, int flipnormal)
00418 {
00419     ScanFillContext sf_ctx;
00420     ScanFillVert *eve, *v1, *vlast;
00421     ScanFillFace *efa;
00422     DispList *dlnew=NULL, *dl;
00423     float *f1;
00424     int colnr=0, charidx=0, cont=1, tot, a, *index, nextcol= 0;
00425     intptr_t totvert;
00426     
00427     if (dispbase==NULL) return;
00428     if (dispbase->first==NULL) return;
00429 
00430     while (cont) {
00431         cont= 0;
00432         totvert= 0;
00433         nextcol= 0;
00434         
00435         BLI_begin_edgefill(&sf_ctx);
00436         
00437         dl= dispbase->first;
00438         while (dl) {
00439     
00440             if (dl->type==DL_POLY) {
00441                 if (charidx<dl->charidx) cont= 1;
00442                 else if (charidx==dl->charidx) { /* character with needed index */
00443                     if (colnr==dl->col) {
00444                         /* make editverts and edges */
00445                         f1= dl->verts;
00446                         a= dl->nr;
00447                         eve= v1= NULL;
00448                         
00449                         while (a--) {
00450                             vlast= eve;
00451 
00452                             eve = BLI_addfillvert(&sf_ctx, f1);
00453                             totvert++;
00454 
00455                             if (vlast==NULL) v1= eve;
00456                             else {
00457                                 BLI_addfilledge(&sf_ctx, vlast, eve);
00458                             }
00459                             f1+=3;
00460                         }
00461 
00462                         if (eve!=NULL && v1!=NULL) {
00463                             BLI_addfilledge(&sf_ctx, eve, v1);
00464                         }
00465                     }
00466                     else if (colnr<dl->col) {
00467                         /* got poly with next material at current char */
00468                         cont= 1;
00469                         nextcol= 1;
00470                     }
00471                 }
00472             }
00473             dl= dl->next;
00474         }
00475         
00476         if (totvert && (tot= BLI_edgefill(&sf_ctx, FALSE))) { // XXX (obedit && obedit->actcol)?(obedit->actcol-1):0)) {
00477             if (tot) {
00478                 dlnew= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "filldisplist");
00479                 dlnew->type= DL_INDEX3;
00480                 dlnew->col= colnr;
00481                 dlnew->nr= totvert;
00482                 dlnew->parts= tot;
00483 
00484                 dlnew->index= MEM_mallocN(tot*3*sizeof(int), "dlindex");
00485                 dlnew->verts= MEM_mallocN(totvert*3*sizeof(float), "dlverts");
00486                 
00487                 /* vert data */
00488                 f1= dlnew->verts;
00489                 totvert= 0;
00490                 eve= sf_ctx.fillvertbase.first;
00491                 while (eve) {
00492                     copy_v3_v3(f1, eve->co);
00493                     f1+= 3;
00494     
00495                     /* index number */
00496                     eve->tmp.l = totvert;
00497                     totvert++;
00498                     
00499                     eve= eve->next;
00500                 }
00501                 
00502                 /* index data */
00503                 efa = sf_ctx.fillfacebase.first;
00504                 index= dlnew->index;
00505                 while (efa) {
00506                     index[0]= (intptr_t)efa->v1->tmp.l;
00507                     index[1]= (intptr_t)efa->v2->tmp.l;
00508                     index[2]= (intptr_t)efa->v3->tmp.l;
00509 
00510                     if (flipnormal)
00511                         SWAP(int, index[0], index[2]);
00512                     
00513                     index+= 3;
00514                     efa= efa->next;
00515                 }
00516             }
00517 
00518             BLI_addhead(to, dlnew);
00519             
00520         }
00521         BLI_end_edgefill(&sf_ctx);
00522 
00523         if (nextcol) {
00524             /* stay at current char but fill polys with next material */
00525             colnr++;
00526         }
00527         else {
00528             /* switch to next char and start filling from first material */
00529             charidx++;
00530             colnr= 0;
00531         }
00532     }
00533     
00534     /* do not free polys, needed for wireframe display */
00535     
00536 }
00537 
00538 static void bevels_to_filledpoly(Curve *cu, ListBase *dispbase)
00539 {
00540     ListBase front, back;
00541     DispList *dl, *dlnew;
00542     float *fp, *fp1;
00543     int a, dpoly;
00544     
00545     front.first= front.last= back.first= back.last= NULL;
00546     
00547     dl= dispbase->first;
00548     while (dl) {
00549         if (dl->type==DL_SURF) {
00550             if ( (dl->flag & DL_CYCL_V) && (dl->flag & DL_CYCL_U)==0 ) {
00551                 if ( (cu->flag & CU_BACK) && (dl->flag & DL_BACK_CURVE) ) {
00552                     dlnew= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "filldisp");
00553                     BLI_addtail(&front, dlnew);
00554                     dlnew->verts= fp1= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float)*3*dl->parts, "filldisp1");
00555                     dlnew->nr= dl->parts;
00556                     dlnew->parts= 1;
00557                     dlnew->type= DL_POLY;
00558                     dlnew->col= dl->col;
00559                     dlnew->charidx = dl->charidx;
00560                     
00561                     fp= dl->verts;
00562                     dpoly= 3*dl->nr;
00563                     
00564                     a= dl->parts;
00565                     while (a--) {
00566                         copy_v3_v3(fp1, fp);
00567                         fp1+= 3;
00568                         fp+= dpoly;
00569                     }
00570                 }
00571                 if ( (cu->flag & CU_FRONT) && (dl->flag & DL_FRONT_CURVE) ) {
00572                     dlnew= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "filldisp");
00573                     BLI_addtail(&back, dlnew);
00574                     dlnew->verts= fp1= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(float)*3*dl->parts, "filldisp1");
00575                     dlnew->nr= dl->parts;
00576                     dlnew->parts= 1;
00577                     dlnew->type= DL_POLY;
00578                     dlnew->col= dl->col;
00579                     dlnew->charidx= dl->charidx;
00580                     
00581                     fp= dl->verts+3*(dl->nr-1);
00582                     dpoly= 3*dl->nr;
00583                     
00584                     a= dl->parts;
00585                     while (a--) {
00586                         copy_v3_v3(fp1, fp);
00587                         fp1+= 3;
00588                         fp+= dpoly;
00589                     }
00590                 }
00591             }
00592         }
00593         dl= dl->next;
00594     }
00595 
00596     filldisplist(&front, dispbase, 1);
00597     filldisplist(&back, dispbase, 0);
00598     
00599     freedisplist(&front);
00600     freedisplist(&back);
00601 
00602     filldisplist(dispbase, dispbase, 0);
00603     
00604 }
00605 
00606 static void curve_to_filledpoly(Curve *cu, ListBase *UNUSED(nurb), ListBase *dispbase)
00607 {
00608     if (cu->flag & CU_3D) return;
00609 
00610     if (dispbase->first && ((DispList*) dispbase->first)->type==DL_SURF) {
00611         bevels_to_filledpoly(cu, dispbase);
00612     }
00613     else {
00614         filldisplist(dispbase, dispbase, 0);
00615     }
00616 }
00617 
00618 /* taper rules:
00619  * - only 1 curve
00620  * - first point left, last point right
00621  * - based on subdivided points in original curve, not on points in taper curve (still)
00622  */
00623 float calc_taper(Scene *scene, Object *taperobj, int cur, int tot)
00624 {
00625     DispList *dl;
00626     
00627     if (taperobj==NULL || taperobj->type!=OB_CURVE) return 1.0;
00628     
00629     dl= taperobj->disp.first;
00630     if (dl==NULL) {
00631         makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, taperobj, 0);
00632         dl= taperobj->disp.first;
00633     }
00634     if (dl) {
00635         float fac= ((float)cur)/(float)(tot-1);
00636         float minx, dx, *fp;
00637         int a;
00638         
00639         /* horizontal size */
00640         minx= dl->verts[0];
00641         dx= dl->verts[3*(dl->nr-1)] - minx;
00642         if (dx > 0.0f) {
00643         
00644             fp= dl->verts;
00645             for (a=0; a<dl->nr; a++, fp+=3) {
00646                 if ( (fp[0]-minx)/dx >= fac) {
00647                     /* interpolate with prev */
00648                     if (a>0) {
00649                         float fac1= (fp[-3]-minx)/dx;
00650                         float fac2= (fp[0]-minx)/dx;
00651                         if (fac1!=fac2)
00652                             return fp[1]*(fac1-fac)/(fac1-fac2) + fp[-2]*(fac-fac2)/(fac1-fac2);
00653                     }
00654                     return fp[1];
00655                 }
00656             }
00657             return fp[-2];  // last y coord
00658         }
00659     }
00660     
00661     return 1.0;
00662 }
00663 
00664 void makeDispListMBall(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
00665 {
00666     if (!ob || ob->type!=OB_MBALL) return;
00667 
00668     // XXX: mball stuff uses plenty of global variables
00669     //      while this is unchanged updating during render is unsafe
00670     if (G.rendering) return;
00671 
00672     freedisplist(&(ob->disp));
00673 
00674     if (ob->type==OB_MBALL) {
00675         if (ob==find_basis_mball(scene, ob)) {
00676             metaball_polygonize(scene, ob, &ob->disp);
00677             tex_space_mball(ob);
00678 
00679             object_deform_mball(ob, &ob->disp);
00680         }
00681     }
00682     
00683     boundbox_displist(ob);
00684 }
00685 
00686 void makeDispListMBall_forRender(Scene *scene, Object *ob, ListBase *dispbase)
00687 {
00688     metaball_polygonize(scene, ob, dispbase);
00689     tex_space_mball(ob);
00690     
00691     object_deform_mball(ob, dispbase);
00692 }
00693 
00694 static ModifierData *curve_get_tessellate_point(Scene *scene, Object *ob, int forRender, int editmode)
00695 {
00696     ModifierData *md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00697     ModifierData *pretessellatePoint;
00698     int required_mode;
00699 
00700     if (forRender) required_mode = eModifierMode_Render;
00701     else required_mode = eModifierMode_Realtime;
00702 
00703     if (editmode) required_mode |= eModifierMode_Editmode;
00704 
00705     pretessellatePoint = NULL;
00706     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00707         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00708 
00709         if (!modifier_isEnabled(scene, md, required_mode)) continue;
00710         if (mti->type == eModifierTypeType_Constructive) return pretessellatePoint;
00711 
00712         if (ELEM3(md->type, eModifierType_Hook, eModifierType_Softbody, eModifierType_MeshDeform)) {
00713             pretessellatePoint = md;
00714 
00715             /* this modifiers are moving point of tessellation automatically
00716              * (some of them even can't be applied on tessellated curve), set flag
00717              * for incformation button in modifier's header */
00718             md->mode |= eModifierMode_ApplyOnSpline;
00719         }
00720         else if (md->mode&eModifierMode_ApplyOnSpline) {
00721             pretessellatePoint = md;
00722         }
00723     }
00724 
00725     return pretessellatePoint;
00726 }
00727 
00728 static void curve_calc_modifiers_pre(Scene *scene, Object *ob, int forRender, float (**originalVerts_r)[3], float (**deformedVerts_r)[3], int *numVerts_r)
00729 {
00730     ModifierData *md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00731     ModifierData *pretessellatePoint;
00732     Curve *cu= ob->data;
00733     ListBase *nurb= BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
00734     int numVerts = 0;
00735     int editmode = (!forRender && cu->editnurb);
00736     float (*originalVerts)[3] = NULL;
00737     float (*deformedVerts)[3] = NULL;
00738     float *keyVerts= NULL;
00739     int required_mode;
00740 
00741     if (forRender) required_mode = eModifierMode_Render;
00742     else required_mode = eModifierMode_Realtime;
00743 
00744     pretessellatePoint = curve_get_tessellate_point(scene, ob, forRender, editmode);
00745     
00746     if (editmode) required_mode |= eModifierMode_Editmode;
00747 
00748     if (cu->editnurb==NULL) {
00749         keyVerts= do_ob_key(scene, ob);
00750 
00751         if (keyVerts) {
00752             /* split coords from key data, the latter also includes
00753              * tilts, which is passed through in the modifier stack.
00754              * this is also the reason curves do not use a virtual
00755              * shape key modifier yet. */
00756             deformedVerts= curve_getKeyVertexCos(cu, nurb, keyVerts);
00757             originalVerts= MEM_dupallocN(deformedVerts);
00758             numVerts = count_curveverts_without_handles(nurb);
00759         }
00760     }
00761     
00762     if (pretessellatePoint) {
00763         for (; md; md=md->next) {
00764             ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00765 
00766             md->scene= scene;
00767             
00768             if ((md->mode & required_mode) != required_mode) continue;
00769             if (mti->isDisabled && mti->isDisabled(md, forRender)) continue;
00770             if (mti->type!=eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform) continue;
00771 
00772             if (!deformedVerts) {
00773                 deformedVerts = curve_getVertexCos(cu, nurb, &numVerts);
00774                 originalVerts = MEM_dupallocN(deformedVerts);
00775             }
00776 
00777             mti->deformVerts(md, ob, NULL, deformedVerts, numVerts, forRender, editmode);
00778 
00779             if (md==pretessellatePoint)
00780                 break;
00781         }
00782     }
00783 
00784     if (deformedVerts)
00785         curve_applyVertexCos(cu, nurb, deformedVerts);
00786     if (keyVerts) /* these are not passed through modifier stack */
00787         curve_applyKeyVertexTilts(cu, nurb, keyVerts);
00788 
00789     if (keyVerts)
00790         MEM_freeN(keyVerts);
00791 
00792     *originalVerts_r = originalVerts;
00793     *deformedVerts_r = deformedVerts;
00794     *numVerts_r = numVerts;
00795 }
00796 
00797 static float (*displist_get_allverts (ListBase *dispbase, int *totvert))[3]
00798 {
00799     DispList *dl;
00800     float (*allverts)[3], *fp;
00801 
00802     *totvert= 0;
00803 
00804     for (dl=dispbase->first; dl; dl=dl->next)
00805         *totvert+= (dl->type==DL_INDEX3)?dl->nr:dl->parts*dl->nr;
00806 
00807     allverts= MEM_mallocN((*totvert)*sizeof(float)*3, "displist_get_allverts allverts");
00808     fp= (float*)allverts;
00809     for (dl=dispbase->first; dl; dl=dl->next) {
00810         int offs= 3 * ((dl->type==DL_INDEX3)?dl->nr:dl->parts*dl->nr);
00811         memcpy(fp, dl->verts, sizeof(float) * offs);
00812         fp+= offs;
00813     }
00814 
00815     return allverts;
00816 }
00817 
00818 static void displist_apply_allverts(ListBase *dispbase, float (*allverts)[3])
00819 {
00820     DispList *dl;
00821     float *fp;
00822 
00823     fp= (float*)allverts;
00824     for (dl=dispbase->first; dl; dl=dl->next) {
00825         int offs= 3 * ((dl->type==DL_INDEX3)?dl->nr:dl->parts*dl->nr);
00826         memcpy(dl->verts, fp, sizeof(float) * offs);
00827         fp+= offs;
00828     }
00829 }
00830 
00831 static void curve_calc_modifiers_post(Scene *scene, Object *ob, ListBase *dispbase,
00832     DerivedMesh **derivedFinal, int forRender, float (*originalVerts)[3], float (*deformedVerts)[3])
00833 {
00834     ModifierData *md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
00835     ModifierData *pretessellatePoint;
00836     Curve *cu= ob->data;
00837     ListBase *nurb= BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
00838     int required_mode = 0, totvert = 0;
00839     int editmode = (!forRender && cu->editnurb);
00840     DerivedMesh *dm= NULL, *ndm;
00841     float (*vertCos)[3] = NULL;
00842     int useCache = !forRender;
00843 
00844     if (forRender) required_mode = eModifierMode_Render;
00845     else required_mode = eModifierMode_Realtime;
00846 
00847     pretessellatePoint = curve_get_tessellate_point(scene, ob, forRender, editmode);
00848     
00849     if (editmode) required_mode |= eModifierMode_Editmode;
00850 
00851     if (pretessellatePoint) {
00852         md = pretessellatePoint->next;
00853     }
00854 
00855     if (derivedFinal && *derivedFinal) {
00856         (*derivedFinal)->release (*derivedFinal);
00857     }
00858 
00859     for (; md; md=md->next) {
00860         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00861 
00862         md->scene= scene;
00863 
00864         if ((md->mode & required_mode) != required_mode) continue;
00865         if (mti->isDisabled && mti->isDisabled(md, forRender)) continue;
00866 
00867         if (mti->type == eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform ||
00868                 (mti->type == eModifierTypeType_DeformOrConstruct && !dm)) {
00869             if (dm) {
00870                 if (!vertCos) {
00871                     totvert = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00872                     vertCos = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*vertCos) * totvert, "dfmv");
00873                     dm->getVertCos(dm, vertCos);
00874                 }
00875 
00876                 mti->deformVerts(md, ob, dm, vertCos, totvert, forRender, editmode);
00877             }
00878             else {
00879                 if (!vertCos) {
00880                     vertCos= displist_get_allverts(dispbase, &totvert);
00881                 }
00882 
00883                 mti->deformVerts(md, ob, NULL, vertCos, totvert, forRender, editmode);
00884             }
00885         }
00886         else {
00887             if (!derivedFinal) {
00888                 /* makeDisplistCurveTypes could be used for beveling, where derived mesh */
00889                 /* is totally unnecessary, so we could stop modifiers applying */
00890                 /* when we found constructive modifier but derived mesh is unwanted result */
00891                 break;
00892             }
00893 
00894             if (dm) {
00895                 if (vertCos) {
00896                     DerivedMesh *tdm = CDDM_copy(dm);
00897                     dm->release(dm);
00898                     dm = tdm;
00899 
00900                     CDDM_apply_vert_coords(dm, vertCos);
00901                     CDDM_calc_normals_mapping(dm);
00902                 }
00903             }
00904             else {
00905                 if (vertCos) {
00906                     displist_apply_allverts(dispbase, vertCos);
00907                 }
00908 
00909                 if (ELEM(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_FONT) && (cu->flag & CU_DEFORM_FILL)) {
00910                     curve_to_filledpoly(cu, nurb, dispbase);
00911                 }
00912 
00913                 dm= CDDM_from_curve_customDB(ob, dispbase);
00914 
00915                 CDDM_calc_normals_mapping(dm);
00916             }
00917 
00918             if (vertCos) {
00919                 /* Vertex coordinates were applied to necessary data, could free it */
00920                 MEM_freeN(vertCos);
00921                 vertCos= NULL;
00922             }
00923 
00924             ndm = mti->applyModifier(md, ob, dm, forRender, useCache);
00925 
00926             if (ndm) {
00927                 /* Modifier returned a new derived mesh */
00928 
00929                 if (dm && dm != ndm) /* Modifier  */
00930                     dm->release (dm);
00931                 dm = ndm;
00932             }
00933         }
00934     }
00935 
00936     if (vertCos) {
00937         if (dm) {
00938             DerivedMesh *tdm = CDDM_copy(dm);
00939             dm->release(dm);
00940             dm = tdm;
00941 
00942             CDDM_apply_vert_coords(dm, vertCos);
00943             CDDM_calc_normals_mapping(dm);
00944             MEM_freeN(vertCos);
00945         }
00946         else {
00947             displist_apply_allverts(dispbase, vertCos);
00948             MEM_freeN(vertCos);
00949             vertCos= NULL;
00950         }
00951     }
00952 
00953     if (derivedFinal) {
00954         if (dm) DM_ensure_tessface(dm); /* needed for drawing */
00955         (*derivedFinal) = dm;
00956     }
00957 
00958     if (deformedVerts) {
00959         curve_applyVertexCos(ob->data, nurb, originalVerts);
00960         MEM_freeN(originalVerts);
00961         MEM_freeN(deformedVerts);
00962     }
00963 }
00964 
00965 static void displist_surf_indices(DispList *dl)
00966 {
00967     int a, b, p1, p2, p3, p4;
00968     int *index;
00969     
00970     dl->totindex= 0;
00971     
00972     index=dl->index= MEM_mallocN( 4*sizeof(int)*(dl->parts+1)*(dl->nr+1), "index array nurbs");
00973     
00974     for (a=0; a<dl->parts; a++) {
00975         
00976         if (surfindex_displist(dl, a, &b, &p1, &p2, &p3, &p4)==0)
00977             break;
00978         
00979         for (; b<dl->nr; b++, index+=4) {   
00980             index[0]= p1;
00981             index[1]= p2;
00982             index[2]= p4;
00983             index[3]= p3;
00984             
00985             dl->totindex++;
00986             
00987             p2= p1; p1++;
00988             p4= p3; p3++;
00989 
00990         }
00991     }
00992     
00993 }
00994 
00995 static DerivedMesh *create_orco_dm(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
00996 {
00997     DerivedMesh *dm;
00998     ListBase disp= {NULL, NULL};
00999 
01000     /* OrcoDM should be created from underformed disp lists */
01001     makeDispListCurveTypes_forOrco(scene, ob, &disp);
01002     dm= CDDM_from_curve_customDB(ob, &disp);
01003 
01004     freedisplist(&disp);
01005 
01006     return dm;
01007 }
01008 
01009 static void add_orco_dm(Scene *scene, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm, DerivedMesh *orcodm)
01010 {
01011     float (*orco)[3], (*layerorco)[3];
01012     int totvert, a;
01013     Curve *cu= ob->data;
01014 
01015     totvert= dm->getNumVerts(dm);
01016 
01017     if (orcodm) {
01018         orco= MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*3*totvert, "dm orco");
01019 
01020         if (orcodm->getNumVerts(orcodm) == totvert)
01021             orcodm->getVertCos(orcodm, orco);
01022         else
01023             dm->getVertCos(dm, orco);
01024     }
01025     else {
01026         orco= (float(*)[3])make_orco_curve(scene, ob);
01027     }
01028 
01029     for (a=0; a<totvert; a++) {
01030         float *co = orco[a];
01031         co[0] = (co[0]-cu->loc[0])/cu->size[0];
01032         co[1] = (co[1]-cu->loc[1])/cu->size[1];
01033         co[2] = (co[2]-cu->loc[2])/cu->size[2];
01034     }
01035 
01036     if ((layerorco = DM_get_vert_data_layer(dm, CD_ORCO))) {
01037         memcpy(layerorco, orco, sizeof(float)*totvert);
01038         MEM_freeN(orco);
01039     }
01040     else
01041         DM_add_vert_layer(dm, CD_ORCO, CD_ASSIGN, orco);
01042 }
01043 
01044 static void curve_calc_orcodm(Scene *scene, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *derivedFinal, int forRender)
01045 {
01046     /* this function represents logic of mesh's orcodm calculation */
01047     /* for displist-based objects */
01048 
01049     ModifierData *md = modifiers_getVirtualModifierList(ob);
01050     ModifierData *pretessellatePoint;
01051     Curve *cu= ob->data;
01052     int required_mode;
01053     int editmode = (!forRender && cu->editnurb);
01054     DerivedMesh *ndm, *orcodm= NULL;
01055 
01056     if (forRender) required_mode = eModifierMode_Render;
01057     else required_mode = eModifierMode_Realtime;
01058 
01059     pretessellatePoint = curve_get_tessellate_point(scene, ob, forRender, editmode);
01060 
01061     if (editmode) required_mode |= eModifierMode_Editmode;
01062 
01063     if (pretessellatePoint) {
01064         md = pretessellatePoint->next;
01065     }
01066 
01067     for (; md; md=md->next) {
01068         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
01069 
01070         md->scene= scene;
01071 
01072         if ((md->mode & required_mode) != required_mode) continue;
01073         if (mti->isDisabled && mti->isDisabled(md, forRender)) continue;
01074         if (mti->type!=eModifierTypeType_Constructive) continue;
01075 
01076         if (!orcodm)
01077             orcodm= create_orco_dm(scene, ob);
01078 
01079         ndm = mti->applyModifier(md, ob, orcodm, forRender, 0);
01080 
01081         if (ndm) {
01082             /* if the modifier returned a new dm, release the old one */
01083             if (orcodm && orcodm != ndm) {
01084                 orcodm->release(orcodm);
01085             }
01086             orcodm = ndm;
01087         }
01088     }
01089 
01090     /* add an orco layer if needed */
01091     add_orco_dm(scene, ob, derivedFinal, orcodm);
01092 
01093     if (orcodm)
01094         orcodm->release(orcodm);
01095 }
01096 
01097 void makeDispListSurf(Scene *scene, Object *ob, ListBase *dispbase,
01098     DerivedMesh **derivedFinal, int forRender, int forOrco)
01099 {
01100     ListBase *nubase;
01101     Nurb *nu;
01102     Curve *cu = ob->data;
01103     DispList *dl;
01104     float *data;
01105     int len;
01106     int numVerts;
01107     float (*originalVerts)[3];
01108     float (*deformedVerts)[3];
01109 
01110     if (!forRender && cu->editnurb)
01111         nubase= curve_editnurbs(cu);
01112     else
01113         nubase= &cu->nurb;
01114 
01115     if (!forOrco)
01116         curve_calc_modifiers_pre(scene, ob, forRender, &originalVerts, &deformedVerts, &numVerts);
01117 
01118     for (nu=nubase->first; nu; nu=nu->next) {
01119         if (forRender || nu->hide==0) {
01120             int resolu= nu->resolu, resolv= nu->resolv;
01121 
01122             if (forRender) {
01123                 if (cu->resolu_ren) resolu= cu->resolu_ren;
01124                 if (cu->resolv_ren) resolv= cu->resolv_ren;
01125             }
01126 
01127             if (nu->pntsv==1) {
01128                 len= SEGMENTSU(nu)*resolu;
01129 
01130                 dl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "makeDispListsurf");
01131                 dl->verts= MEM_callocN(len*3*sizeof(float), "dlverts");
01132 
01133                 BLI_addtail(dispbase, dl);
01134                 dl->parts= 1;
01135                 dl->nr= len;
01136                 dl->col= nu->mat_nr;
01137                 dl->charidx= nu->charidx;
01138 
01139                 /* dl->rt will be used as flag for render face and */
01140                 /* CU_2D conflicts with R_NOPUNOFLIP */
01141                 dl->rt= nu->flag & ~CU_2D;
01142 
01143                 data= dl->verts;
01144                 if (nu->flagu & CU_NURB_CYCLIC) dl->type= DL_POLY;
01145                 else dl->type= DL_SEGM;
01146 
01147                 makeNurbcurve(nu, data, NULL, NULL, NULL, resolu, 3*sizeof(float));
01148             }
01149             else {
01150                 len= (nu->pntsu*resolu) * (nu->pntsv*resolv);
01151                 
01152                 dl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "makeDispListsurf");
01153                 dl->verts= MEM_callocN(len*3*sizeof(float), "dlverts");
01154                 BLI_addtail(dispbase, dl);
01155 
01156                 dl->col= nu->mat_nr;
01157                 dl->charidx= nu->charidx;
01158 
01159                 /* dl->rt will be used as flag for render face and */
01160                 /* CU_2D conflicts with R_NOPUNOFLIP */
01161                 dl->rt= nu->flag & ~CU_2D;
01162 
01163                 data= dl->verts;
01164                 dl->type= DL_SURF;
01165 
01166                 dl->parts= (nu->pntsu*resolu);  /* in reverse, because makeNurbfaces works that way */
01167                 dl->nr= (nu->pntsv*resolv);
01168                 if (nu->flagv & CU_NURB_CYCLIC) dl->flag|= DL_CYCL_U;   /* reverse too! */
01169                 if (nu->flagu & CU_NURB_CYCLIC) dl->flag|= DL_CYCL_V;
01170 
01171                 makeNurbfaces(nu, data, 0, resolu, resolv);
01172                 
01173                 /* gl array drawing: using indices */
01174                 displist_surf_indices(dl);
01175             }
01176         }
01177     }
01178 
01179     /* make copy of 'undeformed" displist for texture space calculation
01180      * actually, it's not totally undeformed -- pre-tessellation modifiers are
01181      * already applied, thats how it worked for years, so keep for compatibility (sergey) */
01182     copy_displist(&cu->disp, dispbase);
01183 
01184     if (!forRender) {
01185         tex_space_curve(cu);
01186     }
01187 
01188     if (!forOrco)
01189         curve_calc_modifiers_post(scene, ob, dispbase, derivedFinal,
01190             forRender, originalVerts, deformedVerts);
01191 }
01192 
01193 static void rotateBevelPiece(Curve *cu, BevPoint *bevp, DispList *dlb, float widfac, float fac, float **data_r)
01194 {
01195     float *fp, *data = *data_r;
01196     int b;
01197 
01198     fp = dlb->verts;
01199     for (b = 0; b<dlb->nr; b++,fp += 3,data += 3) {
01200         if (cu->flag & CU_3D) {
01201             float vec[3];
01202 
01203             vec[0] = fp[1]+widfac;
01204             vec[1] = fp[2];
01205             vec[2 ]= 0.0;
01206 
01207             mul_qt_v3(bevp->quat, vec);
01208 
01209             data[0] = bevp->vec[0] + fac*vec[0];
01210             data[1] = bevp->vec[1] + fac*vec[1];
01211             data[2] = bevp->vec[2] + fac*vec[2];
01212         }
01213         else {
01214             data[0] = bevp->vec[0] + fac*(widfac+fp[1])*bevp->sina;
01215             data[1] = bevp->vec[1] + fac*(widfac+fp[1])*bevp->cosa;
01216             data[2] = bevp->vec[2] + fac*fp[2];
01217         }
01218     }
01219 
01220     *data_r = data;
01221 }
01222 
01223 static void fillBevelCap(Curve *cu, Nurb *nu, BevPoint *bevp, DispList *dlb, float fac, float widfac, ListBase *dispbase)
01224 {
01225     DispList *dl;
01226     float *data;
01227 
01228     dl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "makeDispListbev2");
01229     dl->verts= data= MEM_callocN(3*sizeof(float)*dlb->nr, "dlverts");
01230 
01231     dl->type= DL_POLY;
01232 
01233     dl->parts= 1;
01234     dl->nr= dlb->nr;
01235     dl->col= nu->mat_nr;
01236     dl->charidx= nu->charidx;
01237 
01238     /* dl->rt will be used as flag for render face and */
01239     /* CU_2D conflicts with R_NOPUNOFLIP */
01240     dl->rt= nu->flag & ~CU_2D;
01241 
01242     rotateBevelPiece(cu, bevp, dlb, widfac, fac, &data);
01243 
01244     BLI_addtail(dispbase, dl);
01245 }
01246 
01247 static void do_makeDispListCurveTypes(Scene *scene, Object *ob, ListBase *dispbase,
01248     DerivedMesh **derivedFinal, int forRender, int forOrco)
01249 {
01250     Curve *cu = ob->data;
01251 
01252     /* we do allow duplis... this is only displist on curve level */
01253     if (!ELEM3(ob->type, OB_SURF, OB_CURVE, OB_FONT)) return;
01254 
01255     if (ob->type==OB_SURF) {
01256         makeDispListSurf(scene, ob, dispbase, derivedFinal, forRender, forOrco);
01257     }
01258     else if (ELEM(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_FONT)) {
01259         ListBase dlbev;
01260         ListBase *nubase;
01261         float (*originalVerts)[3];
01262         float (*deformedVerts)[3];
01263         int numVerts;
01264 
01265         nubase= BKE_curve_nurbs(cu);
01266 
01267         BLI_freelistN(&(cu->bev));
01268 
01269         if (cu->path) free_path(cu->path);
01270         cu->path= NULL;
01271 
01272         if (ob->type==OB_FONT) BKE_text_to_curve(G.main, scene, ob, 0);
01273 
01274         if (!forOrco) curve_calc_modifiers_pre(scene, ob, forRender, &originalVerts, &deformedVerts, &numVerts);
01275 
01276         makeBevelList(ob);
01277 
01278         /* If curve has no bevel will return nothing */
01279         makebevelcurve(scene, ob, &dlbev, forRender);
01280 
01281         /* no bevel or extrude, and no width correction? */
01282         if (!dlbev.first && cu->width==1.0f) {
01283             curve_to_displist(cu, nubase, dispbase, forRender);
01284         }
01285         else {
01286             float widfac= cu->width - 1.0f;
01287             BevList *bl= cu->bev.first;
01288             Nurb *nu= nubase->first;
01289 
01290             for (; bl && nu; bl=bl->next,nu=nu->next) {
01291                 DispList *dl;
01292                 float *data;
01293                 BevPoint *bevp;
01294                 int a;
01295 
01296                 if (bl->nr) { /* blank bevel lists can happen */
01297 
01298                     /* exception handling; curve without bevel or extrude, with width correction */
01299                     if (dlbev.first==NULL) {
01300                         dl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "makeDispListbev");
01301                         dl->verts= MEM_callocN(3*sizeof(float)*bl->nr, "dlverts");
01302                         BLI_addtail(dispbase, dl);
01303 
01304                         if (bl->poly!= -1) dl->type= DL_POLY;
01305                         else dl->type= DL_SEGM;
01306 
01307                         if (dl->type==DL_SEGM) dl->flag = (DL_FRONT_CURVE|DL_BACK_CURVE);
01308 
01309                         dl->parts= 1;
01310                         dl->nr= bl->nr;
01311                         dl->col= nu->mat_nr;
01312                         dl->charidx= nu->charidx;
01313 
01314                         /* dl->rt will be used as flag for render face and */
01315                         /* CU_2D conflicts with R_NOPUNOFLIP */
01316                         dl->rt= nu->flag & ~CU_2D;
01317 
01318                         a= dl->nr;
01319                         bevp= (BevPoint *)(bl+1);
01320                         data= dl->verts;
01321                         while (a--) {
01322                             data[0]= bevp->vec[0]+widfac*bevp->sina;
01323                             data[1]= bevp->vec[1]+widfac*bevp->cosa;
01324                             data[2]= bevp->vec[2];
01325                             bevp++;
01326                             data+=3;
01327                         }
01328                     }
01329                     else {
01330                         DispList *dlb;
01331                         ListBase bottom_capbase = {NULL, NULL};
01332                         ListBase top_capbase = {NULL, NULL};
01333 
01334                         for (dlb=dlbev.first; dlb; dlb=dlb->next) {
01335                             /* for each part of the bevel use a separate displblock */
01336                             dl= MEM_callocN(sizeof(DispList), "makeDispListbev1");
01337                             dl->verts= data= MEM_callocN(3*sizeof(float)*dlb->nr*bl->nr, "dlverts");
01338                             BLI_addtail(dispbase, dl);
01339     
01340                             dl->type= DL_SURF;
01341                             
01342                             dl->flag= dlb->flag & (DL_FRONT_CURVE|DL_BACK_CURVE);
01343                             if (dlb->type==DL_POLY) dl->flag |= DL_CYCL_U;
01344                             if (bl->poly>=0) dl->flag |= DL_CYCL_V;
01345                             
01346                             dl->parts= bl->nr;
01347                             dl->nr= dlb->nr;
01348                             dl->col= nu->mat_nr;
01349                             dl->charidx= nu->charidx;
01350 
01351                             /* dl->rt will be used as flag for render face and */
01352                             /* CU_2D conflicts with R_NOPUNOFLIP */
01353                             dl->rt= nu->flag & ~CU_2D;
01354 
01355                             dl->bevelSplitFlag= MEM_callocN(sizeof(*dl->col2)*((bl->nr+0x1F)>>5), "bevelSplitFlag");
01356     
01357                             /* for each point of poly make a bevel piece */
01358                             bevp= (BevPoint *)(bl+1);
01359                             for (a=0; a<bl->nr; a++,bevp++) {
01360                                 float fac=1.0;
01361                                 if (cu->taperobj==NULL) {
01362                                     if ( (cu->bevobj!=NULL) || !((cu->flag & CU_FRONT) || (cu->flag & CU_BACK)) )
01363                                         fac = bevp->radius;
01364                                 }
01365                                 else {
01366                                     fac = calc_taper(scene, cu->taperobj, a, bl->nr);
01367                                 }
01368 
01369                                 if (bevp->split_tag) {
01370                                     dl->bevelSplitFlag[a>>5] |= 1<<(a&0x1F);
01371                                 }
01372     
01373                                 /* rotate bevel piece and write in data */
01374                                 rotateBevelPiece(cu, bevp, dlb, widfac, fac, &data);
01375 
01376                                 if (cu->bevobj && (cu->flag & CU_FILL_CAPS)) {
01377                                     if (a == 0)
01378                                         fillBevelCap(cu, nu, bevp, dlb, fac, widfac, &bottom_capbase);
01379                                     else if (a == bl->nr - 1)
01380                                         fillBevelCap(cu, nu, bevp, dlb, fac, widfac, &top_capbase);
01381                                 }
01382                             }
01383 
01384                             /* gl array drawing: using indices */
01385                             displist_surf_indices(dl);
01386                         }
01387 
01388                         if (bottom_capbase.first) {
01389                             filldisplist(&bottom_capbase, dispbase, 1);
01390                             filldisplist(&top_capbase, dispbase, 0);
01391                             freedisplist(&bottom_capbase);
01392                             freedisplist(&top_capbase);
01393                         }
01394                     }
01395                 }
01396 
01397             }
01398             freedisplist(&dlbev);
01399         }
01400 
01401         if (!(cu->flag & CU_DEFORM_FILL)) {
01402             curve_to_filledpoly(cu, nubase, dispbase);
01403         }
01404 
01405         if ((cu->flag & CU_PATH) && !forOrco) calc_curvepath(ob);
01406 
01407         /* make copy of 'undeformed" displist for texture space calculation
01408          * actually, it's not totally undeformed -- pre-tessellation modifiers are
01409          * already applied, thats how it worked for years, so keep for compatibility (sergey) */
01410         copy_displist(&cu->disp, dispbase);
01411 
01412         if (!forRender) {
01413             tex_space_curve(cu);
01414         }
01415 
01416         if (!forOrco) curve_calc_modifiers_post(scene, ob, dispbase, derivedFinal, forRender, originalVerts, deformedVerts);
01417 
01418         if (cu->flag & CU_DEFORM_FILL && !ob->derivedFinal) {
01419             curve_to_filledpoly(cu, nubase, dispbase);
01420         }
01421     }
01422 }
01423 
01424 void makeDispListCurveTypes(Scene *scene, Object *ob, int forOrco)
01425 {
01426     Curve *cu= ob->data;
01427     ListBase *dispbase;
01428 
01429     /* The same check for duplis as in do_makeDispListCurveTypes.
01430      * Happens when curve used for constraint/bevel was converted to mesh.
01431      * check there is still needed for render displist and orco displists. */
01432     if (!ELEM3(ob->type, OB_SURF, OB_CURVE, OB_FONT)) return;
01433 
01434     freedisplist(&(ob->disp));
01435     dispbase= &(ob->disp);
01436     freedisplist(dispbase);
01437 
01438     /* free displist used for textspace */
01439     freedisplist(&cu->disp);
01440 
01441     do_makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, ob, dispbase, &ob->derivedFinal, 0, forOrco);
01442 
01443     if (ob->derivedFinal) {
01444         DM_set_object_boundbox (ob, ob->derivedFinal);
01445     }
01446     else {
01447         boundbox_displist (ob);
01448 
01449         /* if there is no derivedMesh, object's boundbox is unneeded */
01450         if (ob->bb) {
01451             MEM_freeN(ob->bb);
01452             ob->bb= NULL;
01453         }
01454     }
01455 }
01456 
01457 void makeDispListCurveTypes_forRender(Scene *scene, Object *ob, ListBase *dispbase,
01458     DerivedMesh **derivedFinal, int forOrco)
01459 {
01460     do_makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, ob, dispbase, derivedFinal, 1, forOrco);
01461 }
01462 
01463 void makeDispListCurveTypes_forOrco(struct Scene *scene, struct Object *ob, struct ListBase *dispbase)
01464 {
01465     do_makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, ob, dispbase, NULL, 1, 1);
01466 }
01467 
01468 /* add Orco layer to the displist object which has got derived mesh and return orco */
01469 float *makeOrcoDispList(Scene *scene, Object *ob, DerivedMesh *derivedFinal, int forRender)
01470 {
01471     float *orco;
01472 
01473     if (derivedFinal == NULL)
01474         derivedFinal= ob->derivedFinal;
01475 
01476     if (!derivedFinal->getVertDataArray(derivedFinal, CD_ORCO)) {
01477         curve_calc_orcodm(scene, ob, derivedFinal, forRender);
01478     }
01479 
01480     orco= derivedFinal->getVertDataArray(derivedFinal, CD_ORCO);
01481 
01482     if (orco) {
01483         orco= MEM_dupallocN(orco);
01484     }
01485 
01486     return orco;
01487 }
01488 
01489 /* this is confusing, there's also min_max_object, appplying the obmat... */
01490 static void boundbox_displist(Object *ob)
01491 {
01492     BoundBox *bb=NULL;
01493     float min[3], max[3];
01494     DispList *dl;
01495     float *vert;
01496     int a, tot=0;
01497     
01498     INIT_MINMAX(min, max);
01499 
01500     if (ELEM3(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_FONT)) {
01501         Curve *cu= ob->data;
01502         int doit= 0;
01503 
01504         if (cu->bb==NULL) cu->bb= MEM_callocN(sizeof(BoundBox), "boundbox");
01505         bb= cu->bb;
01506         
01507         dl= ob->disp.first;
01508 
01509         while (dl) {
01510             if (dl->type==DL_INDEX3) tot= dl->nr;
01511             else tot= dl->nr*dl->parts;
01512             
01513             vert= dl->verts;
01514             for (a=0; a<tot; a++, vert+=3) {
01515                 doit= 1;
01516                 DO_MINMAX(vert, min, max);
01517             }
01518 
01519             dl= dl->next;
01520         }
01521         
01522         if (!doit) {
01523             /* there's no geometry in displist, use zero-sized boundbox */
01524             zero_v3(min);
01525             zero_v3(max);
01526         }
01527         
01528     }
01529     
01530     if (bb) {
01531         boundbox_set_from_min_max(bb, min, max);
01532     }
01533 }
